title: NE-a Parasite
desc:
Post 1435
- Can (and must) be played normally.
- Choose a player. They draw this card.
- If you draw this card because of this card, this card's ability also includes: "You only need one injury to bleed out, and you only need 2 suffocation to suffocate. This card is <:white:1107514189574045726>."
